marklogic.body: Â The Obamabots refuse to look at all the possibilities especially when there were close calls such as 1992. To them, "winning" is all that counts and that people should stifle themselves and put politics above principle. Between the Obamabots and the Limbaugh dittoheads, both of them would rather drown in political porn even when this nation is in its darkest days Bleeding to DEATH. They also love to cheat and force third parties Off the ballots and on air debates and then tell us that "the Constitution prohibits third parties" ! No wonder the USA "left" is DEAD !
